pageProps.readme:
bradtaniguchi-dev

This repo represents my portfolio/blog site that is hosted on github-pages.

Project road-map

roadmap

License

MIT

issue.title: [Feature] Add zod, use it to replace the type information for projects
issue.body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**
Look into adding zod to build out the meta-data validation and logic:
https://www.npmjs.com/package/zod

Should help with #113

commits.message:
chore: migrate project filters to its own component

- This should cut down on re-rendering the list, by leveraging an
internal debounce.
chore: start working on tag select logic.

issue.title: [Feature] Add "show more" button to the bottom of the activity list
issue.body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**
The activity list on the main page should only show the last 5 events. The rest should only be shown once the user clicks on a "show-more" button that is centered

comment.body: Might be able to integrate this into the `use-local-collection` hook.

issue.title: [Feature] Add zod, use it to replace the type information for projects
issue.body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**
Look into adding zod to build out the meta-data validation and logic:
https://www.npmjs.com/package/zod

Should help with #113

issue.title: [Feature] Integrate with dev.to for CMS
issue.body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**
Look into using dev.to posts as a way to manage blog posts and content. Would be cool to integrate and use dev.to more as well.

issue.title: [Feature] Add schedule deployment of what is on main
issue.body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**
Every day, multiple times a day a new deployment should be generated to load the latest activity.

Will need to make sure some e2e tests are still ran, a long with lighthouse tests.

Possibly look into how to handle rollbacks as well?

issue.title: [Bug] Fix layout issue on the bottom of the page
issue.body:
**Describe the bug**
There seems to be a margin issue at the bottom, where not everything is shown on all pages

issue.title: [Bug] Fix layout issue on the bottom of the page
issue.body:
**Describe the bug**
There seems to be a margin issue at the bottom, where not everything is shown on all pages

comment.body: added a lot of margin, should fix the issue.

issue.title: [chore] refactor CI to run only when PR opened
issue.body:
**What needs to be done**

It seems like the github action needs to be migrated to only run on PR create. Review the other actions to verify this is mainlyt the case.

issue.title: [chore] Optimize passed props in internal-client
issue.body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**
Currently the props passed are rather large, but we only care about some of the data. We should optimize it and pass only what we want/need.

commits.message:
chore/110/optimize props (#114)

* chore: optimize props for index page

- only returns what the client-side needs to display.

* chore: update prefixes for local

- removes warning

* chore: update init-job version

* chore: downgrade version to 2

* chore: revert downgrade

- need to migrate the actual flow to a PR file, will be a downgrade but
help limit CI runs.

* chore: revert version upgrade for init-job
